part.title: Main
part.ingredient: 4 TBsp crumbled blue cheese or feta ( whatever is available in your fridge)

part.title: Dressing
part.ingredient: 1 TBsp champagne or white wine vinegar
part.step: Put all dressing ingredients in a small jar with a lid. Give it a good shake and set aside. Sprinkle spinach leaves on a platter, then cranberries and walnuts. Gently crushing the walnuts in your hands as you sprinkle. Drizzle over dressing and then top with crumbled cheese on top. Serve immediate. This recipe can be doubled.
